title: The phone cannot play some streaming media. Why?
answer:
The phone does not support the file format. 

 The following audio/video codes and file formats are supported: 

 − Video encoding: MPEG4, H263, and H264 

 − Audio encoding: AAC and AMR-NB/WB 

 − File formats: 3gp and mp4 

 − Maximum coding rate: 4 Mbit/s 

 The network connection is unstable. 

 The phone's memory is insufficient.
